title: South African Casino Giving a Big Casino Bonus & Free Spins to Try New "Bubble Bubble" Halloween Slot
text:
South African Casino Giving a Big Casino Bonus & Free Spins to Try New "Bubble Bubble" Halloween Slot
Johannesburg, South Africa, October 16, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Just in time for Halloween, a spooky but sexy new slot game, Bubble Bubble, made its debut at South Africa’s Springbok Casino today.
There’s an up to R2500 casino bonus available to try it. Springbok also added one of its most popular video poker games to its mobile casino today. Tri Card Poker is now in the tap-and-swipe casino for iPhones and Android phones and tablets.
Springbok’s introductory bonus for Bubble Bubble includes 100 free spins on the new game.
Bubble Bubble Casino Bonus
150% up to R2500
Includes 100 free spins
Available until October 31, 2015
Bubble Bubble a five reel, 25 payline slot from Realtime Gaming (RTG) with three bonus features that keep the reels spinning longer and add to players’ wins. One of the three features begins when three or more scatters appear.
“Free spins are great. It’s amazing how much you can win without betting any more!” noted Springbok’s manager, Daniel van Wyk. “And this game has not one but three types of free spins!”
The Great Ghosts Feature gives 20 free spins with up to nine Wild Ghosts flying onto the reels after any scatter win is paid. The Wild Witches Feature gives nine free games where Winni the Witch casts spells on other symbols to turn them into Wilds. If a win during the Wild Witches feature is less than ten times the triggering bet, then the Win-Win Feature awards a prize of 100X the bet.
Players looking for Halloween thrills are also enjoying the Count Spectacular slot game, this month’s Game of the Month at Springbok. Available in the online casino and the mobile casino, the vampire-themed game is featured in this month’s $10,000 Freeroll Slot Tournament and everyone that plays it in October earns Double Comp Points.
Tri Card Poker, new this week in the mobile casino, is a trimmed down, fast-paced version of traditional poker that’s easy to play and easy to win. Players play their three-card hand against the dealer's three-card hand. When the extra Pair Plus bet is placed, a pair or better wins no matter what the dealer draws.
Dedicated to South African online casino players, Springbok Casino offers hundreds of online slots and table games from Realtime Gaming.
Watch a video of this online casino news on YouTube.
